reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The project has an overall objective to enhance the adaptive capacity and mitigation to climate change for communities to develop sustainable agricultural production following market orientation at sandy areas of Quang Tri province. The main activities inc lude i) developing agriculture production at the sandy areas following goods trading and climate change adaptation through action research to create and select certain crops production model with climate change adaptation, ii) enhancing capacity on market access for local farmers through training establishing farmer groups for production cooperation establishing network with enterprises and developing lable of agriculture production in the context of climate change, and iii) integrating climate change into the agricultural production development strategy of the sandy areas in Quang tri province through training on climate change and agriculure production for officers of agriculture sector and supporting the establishment of agriculture production development strategy for sandy areas.
